data.title: Exaltation of the Holy Cross
data.meta_description: Posts about Exaltation of the Holy Cross written by Thomas
data.text:
All times are UTC/GMT

Monday 14

09:30

Live from Sala Stampa, Vatican City. Press Conference for the presentation of the “Courtyard of Francis”: Humanity, dialogue between believers and non-believers, promoted by the Pontifical Council for Culture, to take place in Assisi from September 23 – 27.

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

10:00

Live from Cachoeira Paulista, São Paulo, Brazil. Holy Mass on the Feast of the Exaltation of the Holy Cross, from the Santuário do Pai das Misericórdias. Presided by Bishop João Inácio Müller, O.F.M., Bishop of Lorena, São Paulo.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV Canção Nova

Streaming Online Live: Here via TV.CançãoNova.com

15:30

Live from Tarnów, Poland. Family of Radio Maryja Meeting and Holy Mass on the Feast of the Exaltation of the Holy Cross, from Cathedral Basilica of the Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary. Presided by Bishop Andrzej Jeż, Bishop of Tarnów.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV TRWAM

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of the Exaltation of the Holy Cross, and 1st Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Archbishop Michele Castoro, Archbishop of Manfredonia-Vieste-San Giovanni Rotondo.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

Tuesday 15

09:30

Live from Sala Stampa, Vatican City. Press Conference on the Apostolic Visit of Pope Francis to Cuba, the United States of America and to the United Nations Organization headquarters, on the occasion of his participation at the Eighth World Meeting of Families in Philadelphia, to take place from 19-28 September 2015.

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

15:00

Live from Bethlehem, Israel. Holy Mass on the Feast of Our Lady of the Sorrows, for the Conclusion of the Plenary Assembly of Bishops’ Conferences of Europe, from the Church of St. Catherine. Presided by Patriarch Fouad Boutros Twal, Latin Patriarch of Jerusalem.

Streaming Online Live: Here via CMC-terrasanta.org

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of Our Lady of the Sorrows, and 2nd Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Alfredo Marchello, O.F.M. Cap., Provincial Vicar of the Province of religious of Puglia-Bari.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

18:30

Live from St. Peter’s Square, Vatican City. Prayer Vigil for the occasion of the World Meeting for Young Consecrated Men and Women. Led by Archbishop José Rodríguez Carballo, O.F.M., Titular Archbishop of Bellicastrum, Secretary of the Congregation for Institutes of Consecrated Life and Societies of Apostolic Life.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, TV2000

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

Wednesday 16

08:00

Papal General Audience

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN, Telepace, TV2000, TRSP, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, KTO

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

Channels Broadcasting Delayed: EWTN (20:00), Canção Nova International (20:00), KTO (13:00, and again at 22:10)

11:00

Live from Sala Stampa, Vatican City. Press Conference for the conclusion of the latest round of Meetings of Pope Francis with the Council of Cardinals to assist in the governance of the Universal Church and to reform the Roman Curia, the so called ‘C9’

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

12:00

EWTN Mass on the Feast of Sts. Cornelius and Cyprian. Presided by Bishop Nicolas Djomo Lola, Bishop of Tshumbe, Democratic Republic of the Congo

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of Sts. Cornelius and Cyprian, and 3rd Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Gaetano La Speme O.F.M Cap., Provincial Vicar of the Province of religious of Siracusa.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

Thursday 17

10:00

Live from Paul VI Audience Hall, Vatican City. Meeting of Pope Francis with participants of the World Meeting for Young Consecrated Men and Women.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

12:00

EWTN Mass on the Feast of the Sacred Stigmata of Saint Francis of Assisi. Presided by Archbishop Jose Serofia Palma, Archbishop of Cebu, Philippines.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Anniversary that St. Francis of Assisi received the Stigmata, and 4th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Luigi Gaetani, O.C.D., Superior of the Province of Discalced Carmelites of Napoletana della Madre di Dio.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

Friday 18

09:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass for staff and patients of Casa Sollievo della Sofferenza, from the Church of Santa Maria delle Grazie. Presided by Archbishop Michele Castoro, Archbishop of Manfredonia-Vieste-San Giovanni Rotondo.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of St. Joseph of Cupertino, and 5th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Sabino Iannuzzi, O.F.M Cap., Provincial Vicar of the Province of religious of Sannio and Irpinia.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

18:30

Live from St. Peter’s Square, Vatican City. Music and Witnessing Evening, entitled “Wake up the World”, at World Meeting for Young Consecrated Men and Women.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, TV2000

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

Saturday 19

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the Feast of St. Francis Mary of Camporosso, and 6th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Mauro Gambetti, O.F.M. Conv., General Custos of the Sacred Convent of Assisi.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

20:00

Live from Habana, Cuba. Apostolic Journey of Pope Francis to Cuba. Arrival and Welcome Ceremony of Pope Francis to Cuba, from José Marti International Airport.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000, KTO, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, Noursat

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

22:00

Live from São Paulo, Brazil. Holy Mass on the Feast of Our Lady of Salette, from the Shrine of Salette.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV Canção Nova

Streaming Online Live: Here via TV.CançãoNova.com

Sunday 20

05:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the 25th Sunday of Ordinary Time, and 7th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Crypt of the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Fr. Gianfranco Palmisani, O.F.M. Cap., Provincial Vicar of the Province of religious of Rome.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

08:00

Live from Wemding, Germany. Holy Mass from the Pilgrimage Basilica of Maria Brünnlein

Channels Broadcasting Live: K-TV Fernsehen

Streaming Online Live: Here via K-TV.org

08:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Commemoration of the Stigmata of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Church of Santa Maria delle Grazie. Presided by Fr. Francesco Colacelli O.F.M Cap., Provincial Vicar of the Province of religious Sant’Angelo e Padre Pio.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

09:00

Live from Cologne, Germany. Holy Mass for the Closing of Kolpingtag 2015, from Lanxess-Arena. Presided by Rainer Maria Cardinal Woelki, Archbishop of Cologne.

Channels Broadcasting Live: EWTN Katholishes

09:00

Live from Kraków-Mogiła, Poland. Holy Mass for the Indulgence of the Holy Cross, from the Basilica Abbey of the Holy Cross of the Cistercians. Presided by Bishop Kazimierz Górny, Bishop Emeritus of Rzeszów.

Channels Broadcasting Live: TV TRWAM

09:30

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass on the25th Sunday of Ordinary Time, and 7th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, from the Square in front of Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Lorenzo Cardinal Baldisseri, Secretary General of the Synod of Bishops.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

11:00

Live from Walsingham, England, UK. Divine Liturgy, in Catholic Rite, for the Annual pilgrimage of Syro Malankara Catholic Missions to the Roman Catholic National Shrine of Our Lady, and Re Union Day Celebrations, from the Chapel of Our Lady of Reconciliation.

Streaming Online Live: Here via Walsingham Catholic TV

12:00

Live from Wemding, Germany. Eucharistic Adoration from the Pilgrimage Basilica of Maria Brünnlein

Channels Broadcasting Live: K-TV Fernsehen

Streaming Online Live: Here via K-TV.org

12:25

Live from Créteil, France. Civic Opening of the new Cathedral of Créteil.

Channels Broadcasting Live: KTO

13:00

Live from Habana, Cuba. Apostolic Journey of Pope Francis to Cuba. Papal Mass on the 25th Sunday in Ordinary Time, followed by recitation of the Angelus, from Plaza de la Revolución. Presided by Pope Francis.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000, KTO, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, Noursat, TV Canção Nova

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

14:30

Live from Créteil, France. Holy Mass for the consecration and dedication of the new Cathedral of Créteil, dedicated to Our Lady. Presided by Andre Cardinal Vingt-Trois, Metropolitan Archbishop of Paris.

Channels Broadcasting Live: KTO

16:00

Live from San Giovanni Rotondo, Foggia, Italy. Holy Mass for 25th Sunday of Ordinary Time, the Feast of St. Andrew Kim Taegon and companions, and 7th Day of the Novena of preparation for the Feast of St. Pio of Pietrelcina, with the Profession of Perpetual Vows of Capucin Novices, from the Pilgrimage Church of St. Pio of Pietrelcina. Presided by Archbishop Domenico Umberto D’Ambrosio, Metropolitan Archbishop of Lecce.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Padre Pio TV

Streaming Online Live: Here via TeleRadioPadrePio.it

20:00

Live from Habana, Cuba. Apostolic Journey of Pope Francis to Cuba. Courtesy Visit of Pope Francis to Raúl Castro, President of the Council of State of Cuba, and Council of Ministers of Cuba, from the Palace of the Plaza de la Revolución.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000, KTO, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, Noursat, TV Canção Nova

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

21:15

Live from Habana, Cuba. Apostolic Journey of Pope Francis to Cuba. Celebration of Vespers with Priests, Religious and Seminarians, from the Cathedral of St. Christopher. Led by Pope Francis.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000, KTO, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, Noursat

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player

22:30

Live from Habana, Cuba. Apostolic Journey of Pope Francis to Cuba. Meeting of Pope Francis with the Youth of Cuba, from Centro Cultural Padre Félix Varela.

Channels Broadcasting Live: Telepace, EWTN, TV2000, KTO, K-TV Fernsehen, TV TRWAM, Noursat

Streaming Online Live: Here via Vatican Player
